publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2827 Jamie Hepburn: Congratulations to President-elect Obama—That the Parliament congratulates President-elect Barack Obama on his historic success in the US elections; notes the record-breaking turnout across the United States of America and the massive number of first-time voters inspired by Obama’s candidacy; believes that the result represents positive change for the USA and the world, especially in light of the continuing wars in Iraq and Afghanistan and the difficulties facing the global economy, and encourages governments around the world to work with the incoming US administration to find solutions to these challenges. Supported by: Andrew Welsh*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Bob Doris*, Bashir Ahmad*, Stuart McMillan*, Joe FitzPatrick*, John Park*, Mike Pringle*, Bill Kidd*, Christine Grahame*, Patrick Harvie*, Alasdair Allan*, Bill Wilson*, Michael Matheson*, Rob Gibson*
S3M-2827 Congratulations to President-elect Obama (lodged on 5 November 2008) Ken Macintosh*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Christina McKelvie*

S3M-2827 Jamie Hepburn: Congratulations to President-elect Obama—That the Parliament congratulates President-elect Barack Obama on his historic success in the US elections; notes the record-breaking turnout across the United States of America and the massive number of first-time voters inspired by Obama’s candidacy; believes that the result represents positive change for the USA and the world, especially in light of the continuing wars in Iraq and Afghanistan and the difficulties facing the global economy, and encourages governments around the world to work with the incoming US administration to find solutions to these challenges. Supported by: Andrew Welsh, Malcolm Chisholm, Bob Doris, Bashir Ahmad, Stuart McMillan, Joe FitzPatrick, John Park, Mike Pringle, Bill Kidd, Christine Grahame, Patrick Harvie, Alasdair Allan, Bill Wilson, Michael Matheson, Rob Gibson, Ken Macintosh, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Christina McKelvie, Dave Thompson*
S3M-2827 Congratulations to President-elect Obama (lodged on 5 November 2008) Gil Paterson*
S3M-2827 Congratulations to President-elect Obama (lodged on 5 November 2008) Keith Brown*
